blogs.title: Sleeping
blogs.author: Vignesh
blogs.about: Sleep is a normal body process that allows your body and brain to rest. At first glance, sleep is deceptively simple. For most people, it's just a matter of getting comfortable, closing your eyes and drifting into slumber.

blogs.title: Cricket
blogs.author: Suren
blogs.about: Cricket is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of eleven players on a field at the centre of which is a 22-yard (20-metre) pitch with a wicket at each end, each comprising two bails balanced on three stumps.

blogs.title: Youtube
blogs.author: Manojh
blogs.about: A YouTube description is a section where a content creator can provide additional information about their video content. This can include content descriptions, links to related content, social media or website links, and more.

blogs.title: Bachelors
blogs.author: Sabari
blogs.about: A bachelor's degree or baccalaureate is an undergraduate academic degree awarded by colleges and universities upon completion of a course of study lasting three to six years. The two most common bachelor's degrees are the Bachelor of Arts and the Bachelor of Science
